thread.title: Deputies say man shot his son at Marysville home
thread.title_full: Deputies say man shot his son at Marysville home - seattlepi.com

author: seattlepi.com
title: Deputies say man shot his son at Marysville home
text:
MARYSVILLE, Wash. (AP) â€” Police say a 64-year-old man was arrested for allegedly shooting his son in Marysville.
Snohomish County sheriff's deputies responded to a call Friday night from the alleged gunman's wife, who said her husband was trying to shoot her as she fled.
When deputies arrived, they found the man's 30-year-old son with a gunshot wound to the abdomen. He was taken to a hospital. His condition was not known.
Authorities say the father was booked on suspicion of domestic violence assault with a weapon.
